    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean canMove​(int psId, int doorNo)
      Returns true if a Pass is allowed to move using the door, false otherwise A move can be made if: the protection rating of the pass >= the danger rating of the destination room AND the destination room is not full AND the pass has hours left >= limit of the destination room AND the pass is currently in the source room AND the pass id is for a pass in the system AND the door number is the number for a door in the system
      void evacuateAll()
      In an emergency, evacuates all passes directly back to the Outside without affecting information and not using existing doors
      int findPass​(int ps)
      Returns the name of the room which contains the specified pass or null

      Resets all passes
      void resetPass​(int id)
      Resets one passes: moves to 0, available hours left to allowable hours
      java.lang.String showPass​(int pNo)
      Returns a String with all of the details of a Pass
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns all of the details of all rooms including the passes currently in each room, or "No passes"

      • canMove

        boolean canMove​(int psId,
                int doorNo)
        Returns true if a Pass is allowed to move using the door, false otherwise A move can be made if: the protection rating of the pass >= the danger rating of the destination room AND the destination room is not full AND the pass has hours left >= limit of the destination room AND the pass is currently in the source room AND the pass id is for a pass in the system AND the door number is the number for a door in the system
        Parameters:
        psId - is the id of the pass requesting the move
        doorNo - is the number of the door through which the pass wants to move
        Returns:
        true if the pass is allowed in the move, false otherwise

      • move

        java.lang.String move​(int psId,
                      int doorNo)
        Returns the result of a pass requesting to move by Door. A move will be successful if: the protection rating of the pass >= the danger rating of the destination room AND the destination room is not full AND the pass has sufficient hours left >= limit of the destination room AND the pass is currently in the source room AND the pass id is for a pass in the system AND the door number is the number for a door in the system If the move can be made, the pass information is removed from the source room, added to the destination room and a suitable message returned. If move cannot be made, the state of the system remains unchanged and a message specifying the reason is returned.
        Parameters:
        psId - is the id of the pass requesting the move
        doorNo - is the number of the door through which the pass wants to move
        Returns:
        a String giving the result of the request

      • resetAllPasses

        void resetAllPasses()
        Resets all passes

      • resetPass

        void resetPass​(int id)
        Resets one passes: moves to 0, available hours left to allowable hours
        Parameters:
        id - of the pass

      • moveOutside

        void moveOutside​(int id)
        Moves a pass directly back to the Outside without affecting data and not using existing doors

      • evacuateAll

        void evacuateAll()
        In an emergency, evacuates all passes directly back to the Outside without affecting information and not using existing doors
